about_the_game:
New playable character!


This DLC adds Jackie Frost as a playable character!

Jackie Frost uses ice magic to deal damage to numerous foes. Jackie Frost comes with her own unique staff "Jackie's Staff" which enhances her magical abilities even further.

To recruit Jackie, talk to her in Kemivieska. You can talk to Frosty after to swap between Frosty and Jackie.
detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Fully Voice Acted follower
  • Jackie Frost has unique equipment and magic
  • Unique flavor lines, story adapts to having Jackie Frost in party


About the Game

New playable character!


This DLC adds Jackie Frost as a playable character!

Jackie Frost uses ice magic to deal damage to numerous foes. Jackie Frost comes with her own unique staff "Jackie's Staff" which enhances her magical abilities even further.

To recruit Jackie, talk to her in Kemivieska. You can talk to Frosty after to swap between Frosty and Jackie.
name: Mrs.Santa's Gift Hunt - Jackie Frost

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
